response.original_title: A Nuestro Tiempo (Closer to Our Time)
response.overview: Quagliata Blanco turns to the archive once more. Here she samples images from Leobardo López Arretche’s landmark 1968 protest documentary El Grito to stress the unresolved promises of the 1968 cultural revolution in Mexico.
response.tagline: Quagliata Blanco turns to the archive once more. Here she samples images from Leobardo López Arretche’s landmark 1968 protest documentary El Grito to stress the unresolved promises of the 1968 cultural revolution in Mexico.
response.title: A Nuestro Tiempo (Closer to Our Time)
